package.name: jaco_description
package.description: 3D model of various Kinova robotic arms. Includes the model and URDF files for working with an arm in Drake (and possibly RViz and/or Gazebo).
package.author: Kinova ROS Support
Drake Users

export.deprecated: The 'package://jaco_description' URI spelling is deprecated, and will be removed from Drake on or around 2022-03-01. Please spell the URI as 'package://drake/manipulation/models/jaco_description' instead.
